ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
{T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
{T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
{T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

{T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
{T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
{T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_CREATURE_ATTACKING ) filter:SetHint( HINT_NEUTRAL, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:Untap() end
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_DOESNT_RECEIVE_COMBAT_DAMAGE, 1 ) characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_DOESNT_DEAL_COMBAT_DAMAGE, 1 ) end
